## IDragger.onDragEnd() method

Handles any drag cleanup.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onDragEnd(e: PointerEvent, totalDelta: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | PointerEvent | PointerEvent that finished the drag. |
|  totalDelta | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) | The total distance, in pixels, that the mouse has moved since the start of the drag. |

**Returns:**

void
